content.text:
# The prophecy of the White King

The prophecy of the White King is an English political-astrological prophecy dating from medieval times. In its earlier form it may have referred to Stephen, King of England (c. 1092â€“1154).
It was revived 1644 by William Lilly in his booklet A Prophecy of the White King; and Dreadfull Dead-man Explaned.
